name: dynamodb-history-storer
description: Store DynamoDB stream records to S3 and enable search from Athena

scripts.build: mkdir -p .build/pkg && cp -r package.json src/ .build/pkg && (cd .build/pkg && npm install --only=prod)
scripts.package: npm run build && sam package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file .build/sam.packaged.yml --s3-bucket $npm_package_config_bucket
scripts.deploy: npm run package && sam deploy --template-file .build/sam.packaged.yml --stack-name $npm_package_name --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
